analysis.summary: This project aims to develop a planner agent that can break down complex projects into actionable tasks.

dependencies.description: Task generation depends on core planning functionality
Timeline creation requires tasks to be generated first

risks.description: Complexity of task generation may lead to poor quality tasks
risks.mitigation: Implement robust validation and review process

risks.description: Integration with Notion API might be challenging
risks.mitigation: Create a simplified local-first version before Notion integration

tasks.name: Review project and generate tasks manually
tasks.description: The automated task generation failed. Please review the project and generate tasks manually.

milestones.name: Project completion
milestones.description: Timeline generation failed, manual planning required

specifications.1b1c9351-ea0a-44e6-89fa-975b9df2be3e:
[
    {
      "id": "task-1",
      "name": "Design core planning engine architecture",
      "description": "Create the architectural design for the core planning engine, including data models, interfaces, and component interactions.",
      "priority": "high",
      "effort": 5,
      "dependencies": []
    },
    {
      "id": "task-2",
      "name": "Implement task generation module",
      "description": "Develop the module responsible for breaking down projects into actionable tasks with clear priorities.",
      "priority": "high",
      "effort": 8,
      "dependencies": ["task-1"]
    },
    {
      "id": "task-3",
      "name": "Create timeline generation system",
      "description": "Build the component that converts tasks into a timeline with milestones.",
      "priority": "medium",
      "effort": 5,
      "dependencies": ["task-2"]
    }
  ]
